Posts.Content: iledere wrote: Hi everyone, Thank you miss for these forums. I'm hoping to get insight into mastectomy after radiation as I try to make the decision between Bi-lateral lumpectomy and bi-lateral mastectomy, knowing I have an increased risk or reoccurrence, but still wanting to try for a bi-lat lump. Does anyone have any experiences or pictures they can share? Thanks in advance and sending healing thoughts. Best, ileder Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: mastectomy after radiation - pictures and perspectives? iledere iledere
